sn22.81:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
sn22.81:1.2: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya kosambiṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
sn22.81:1.3: Kosambiyaṁ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto sāmaṁ senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya anāmantetvā upaṭṭhāke anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ eko adutiyo cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
sn22.81:2.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu acirapakkantassa bhagavato yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.81:2.2: “esāvuso ānanda, bhagavā sāmaṁ senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya anāmantetvā upaṭṭhāke anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ eko adutiyo cārikaṁ pakkanto”ti.
sn22.81:2.3: “Yasmiṁ, āvuso, samaye bhagavā sāmaṁ senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya anāmantetvā upaṭṭhāke anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ eko adutiyo cārikaṁ pakkamati, ekova bhagavā tasmiṁ samaye viharitukāmo hoti;
sn22.81:2.4: na bhagavā tasmiṁ samaye kenaci anubandhitabbo hotī”ti.
sn22.81:3.1: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena pālileyyakaṁ tadavasari.
sn22.81:3.2: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā pālileyyake viharati bhaddasālamūle.
sn22.81:3.3: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā ānandena saddhiṁ sammodiṁsu.
sn22.81:3.4: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn22.81:3.5: “cirassutā kho no, āvuso ānanda, bhagavato sammukhā dhammī kathā;
sn22.81:3.6: icchāma mayaṁ, āvuso ānanda, bhagavato sammukhā dhammiṁ kathaṁ sotun”ti.
sn22.81:4.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando tehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ yena pālileyyakaṁ bhaddasālamūlaṁ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
sn22.81:4.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinne kho te bhikkhū bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
sn22.81:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn22.81:4.4: “kathaṁ nu kho jānato kathaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hotī”ti?
sn22.81:4.5: Atha kho bhagavā tassa bhikkhuno cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn22.81:4.14: Evaṁ vicayaso desito, bhikkhave, mayā dhammo.
sn22.81:4.15: Evaṁ vicayaso desite kho, bhikkhave, mayā dhamme atha ca panidhekaccassa bhikkhuno evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn22.81:4.16: ‘kathaṁ nu kho jānato kathaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hotī’ti?
sn22.81:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, jānato kathaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti?
sn22.81:5.2: Idha bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto, sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto
sn22.81:5.4: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:5.5: So pana saṅkhāro kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo?
sn22.81:5.6: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:5.8: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:5.10: Sāpi vedanā, sopi phasso anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:5.12: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:6.1: Na heva kho rūpaṁ attato samanupassati;
sn22.81:6.2: api ca kho rūpavantaṁ attānaṁ samanupassati.
sn22.81:6.3: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:6.4: So pana saṅkhāro kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo?
sn22.81:6.5: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:6.7: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:6.12: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:7.1: Na heva kho rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṁ attānaṁ samanupassati;
sn22.81:7.2: api ca kho attani rūpaṁ samanupassati.
sn22.81:7.3: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.

sn22.81:8.1: Na heva kho rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṁ attānaṁ samanupassati, na attani rūpaṁ samanupassati;
sn22.81:8.2: api ca kho rūpasmiṁ attānaṁ samanupassati.
sn22.81:8.3: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:8.4: So pana saṅkhāro kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo?
sn22.81:8.5: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:8.7: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:8.12: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato …pe… āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:9.1: Na heva kho rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṁ attānaṁ, na attani rūpaṁ, na rūpasmiṁ attānaṁ samanupassati;
sn22.81:9.2: api ca kho vedanaṁ attato samanupassati, api ca kho vedanāvantaṁ attānaṁ samanupassati, api ca kho attani vedanaṁ samanupassati, api ca kho vedanāya attānaṁ samanupassati;
sn22.81:9.4: api ca kho saṅkhāre attato samanupassati, api ca kho saṅkhāravantaṁ attānaṁ samanupassati, api ca kho attani saṅkhāre samanupassati, api ca kho saṅkhāresu attānaṁ samanupassati;
sn22.81:9.5: api ca kho viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, api ca kho viññāṇavantaṁ attānaṁ, api ca kho attani viññāṇaṁ, api ca kho viññāṇasmiṁ attānaṁ samanupassati.
sn22.81:9.6: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:9.8: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:9.10: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:9.15: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:10.1: Na heva kho rūpaṁ attato samanupassati,
sn22.81:10.7: ‘so attā so loko, so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’ti.
sn22.81:10.8: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, sassatadiṭṭhi saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:10.10: evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:11.1: Na heva kho rūpaṁ attato samanupassati,
sn22.81:11.7: ‘so attā so loko, so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’ti.
sn22.81:11.9: ‘no cassaṁ no ca me siyā nābhavissaṁ na me bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.81:11.10: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, ucchedadiṭṭhi saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:11.11: So pana saṅkhāro kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo?
sn22.81:11.12: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:11.14: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco …pe…
sn22.81:11.15: evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:12.1: Na heva kho rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, na vedanaṁ …
sn22.81:12.5: na viññāṇasmiṁ attato samanupassati, nāpi evaṁdiṭṭhi hoti:
sn22.81:12.6: ‘so attā so loko, so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’ti;
sn22.81:12.8: ‘no cassaṁ no ca me siyā nābhavissaṁ na me bhavissatī’ti;
sn22.81:12.9: api ca kho kaṅkhī hoti vicikicchī aniṭṭhaṅgato saddhamme.
sn22.81:12.10: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, kaṅkhitā vicikicchitā aniṭṭhaṅgatatā saddhamme saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:12.11: So pana saṅkhāro kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo?
sn22.81:12.12: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:12.14: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:12.19: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hotī”ti.
